Title: Paragraph
data: This is a set of examples to get started with webpd. You need to use a webserver to run those and load the necessary ressources. You'll learn how to load a sample in Pure-Data and save it for playback. Then changing it's speed and looping. After that run the sound stream through an effect. And finally build a simple drum machine.

Title: Gettin Started with Webpd on github
